(sacred [holy], cold-blooded [coldblood], swamp-survival [swampsurvival], swimming [swimming])

magic paths [mpath]: H2
item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
The black-robed priests of C'tis are revered and treated with total respect in the sacred kingdom. They are trained in the Temple City where they perform the sacred services and train the sacred serpents. Each priest is served by a harem of Hierodules.
